name: Braised Celery
preparation: In a fry pan, sauté onion and garlic in olive oil over medium heat, until onion wilts completely and starts to turn brown.
Add bouillon, celery, and seasonings to the pan. Cover and adjust to a steady simmer for 15 minutes or until the celery is soft when prodded with a fork.
Uncover and increase the heat to high to reduce any remaining liquid.
Top with Salt, Pepper, and Parmesan.
tips: Braised celery is a perfect match with roast chicken or pork and is a tasty twist on everyone’s fridge staple.
